articles.author: Andrew Gregory
articles.title: Regularly getting a good night's sleep could cut asthma risk - The Guardian
articles.description: Poor sleep patterns may increase genetic susceptibility and chance of developing condition, study shows
articles.content:
Regularly enjoying a good nights sleep could significantly reduce your risk of developing asthma, a decade-long study suggests.
Asthma affects about 300 million people worldwide. Scientists do not k… [+3278 chars]
